Barack Obama !( CNN)-- Rudy Giuliani Secretary of State Colin Powell announced Sunday that he will be voting for Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's "ability to inspire" and the "inclusive nature of his campaign." I think he is a transformational figure, he is a new generation coming onto the world stage, onto the American stage, and for that reason I'll be voting for Barack Obama , Colin Powell said on NBC's "Meet the Press." Mr Eric Schmidt said that the company's three top executives had decided to "clarify" their roles so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. The company had always argued in the past that its unusual leadership arrangements worked well, and that it reflected the fact that Google was operated differently from most traditional companies.
